title: If we can't have an urf, can we at least get a mortal wombat.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ZsMyGsM.jpg

One's a chubby indestructible killer. The other's a chubby indestructible killer. It's the perfect substitute!

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RJ2UDZNQLM0/VIsyYL0ozCI/AAAAAAAAq-Q/9Z90XERCVFo/s1600/Cb01x.jpg

Or heck, even just a Kennen skin:

https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/011/407/460/df1136e433b8c8774f36fefb899825fc_original.png?w=1536&h=864&fit=fill&bg=000000&v=1463682231&auto=format&q=92&s=0a8dec83f864730098a426fb01fed89e

I'll even take an Aurelion Sol skin. PLEASE. ANYTHING!
